ai-tha-ap445:1.1_0: “Most people are on the bank of the rivers,
ai-tha-ap445:1.4_0: though you have attained the state of existence.
ai-tha-ap445:2.2_0: I recollected the best of Buddha,
ai-tha-ap445:2.3_0: From the night is filled with mosquitoes
ai-tha-ap445:2.4_0: One who is hostile to each other.
ai-tha-ap445:3.3_0: he is a hero, worthy of offerings,
ai-tha-ap445:3.4_0: with a clear and confident heart.
ai-tha-ap445:4.2_0: whatever fruit he enjoyed the fruit,
ai-tha-ap445:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap445:4.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
ai-tha-ap445:5.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
ai-tha-ap445:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap445:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bakkula.
ai-tha-ap445:9.1_0: The third part of the senior monks.
